remarks: If a binary relation holds for the result of an operation which is a result of an operation, the involved classes are sets.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 12-Dec-2017.)
statement:
bropopvvv.o $e |- O = ( v e. _V , e e. _V |-> ( a e. v , b e. v |-> { <. f , p >. | ph } ) ) $.
bropopvvv.p $e |- ( ( v = V /\ e = E ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
bropopvvv.oo $e |- ( ( ( V e. _V /\ E e. _V ) /\ ( A e. V /\ B e. V ) ) -> ( A ( V O E ) B ) = { <. f , p >. | th } ) $.
bropopvvv $p |- ( F ( A ( V O E ) B ) P -> ( ( V e. _V /\ E e. _V ) /\ ( F e. _V /\ P e. _V ) /\ ( A e. V /\ B e. V ) ) ) $.
$d E a b e f p v $.
$d V a b e f p v $.
$d e ps v $.
